nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, a male human served as an ensign of the Galactic Empire. He accompanied Darth Vader and an Imperial Major to Accresker Jail. When Vader brought captured Lieutenant-Inspector Magna Tolvan of the Empire's Inspectorate to their Lambda-class T-4a shuttle, they were ordered to avoid looking directly in her eyes. Both he and the Major died when Alliance to Restore the Republic starfighters destroyed the shuttle.
